typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Start_Date_Tag as date,
		End_Date_Tag as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Fund_ID]\n      ,[Asset_ID]\n      ,[Trx_Type]\n      ,[Trx_Date]\n      ,[Start_Date_Tag]\n      ,[End_Date_Tag]\n  FROM [staging].[Myob_Actuals]',
	format: 'query') ~> StagingDB
StagingDB select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		Start_Date_Tag,
		End_Date_Tag,
		Trx_Date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOutput
BetweenStartandEndDates alterRow(deleteIf(true())) ~> AlterRowDelete
SelectOutput filter(and(toDate(Trx_Date)>=Start_Date_Tag, toDate(Trx_Date)<=End_Date_Tag)) ~> BetweenStartandEndDates
AlterRowDelete sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Trx_ID as long,
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2),
		Update_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string,
		Start_Date_Tag as date,
		End_Date_Tag as date
	),
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Fund_ID','Asset_ID','Trx_Type','Start_Date_Tag','End_Date_Tag'],
	format: 'table',
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Trx_Type,
		Start_Date_Tag,
		End_Date_Tag,
		Trx_Date
	)) ~> DeleteRecords
